column5: I just love it when teams from the original 6 go head to head in the playoffs. Will the Habs go for 3, or will the Bruins find some redemption?

Boston bringing Chara back is a head game plan.They think the Canadians will head hunt,sad to say,I dont think they give a rats   about him.They want the win. Man I took boston all the way to the finals.  You have to give it to the Montreal Candians,they sure know how to do an opening.
Boston were definitely playing a better game while the Habs gave away the 1st period.
Ya you have to play 3 periods in the playoff not 2, that 3rd period by Thomas was special!
I hope my finger nails will grow back by Thursday.    The Bruins always have to do things the hard way.
